title: raamanaamam
sahitya:
rAma nAmam bhajarE mAnasa

caraNam 1

 dongarIti tiruganga nEla rangani padamula kaugalincukoni
   
caraNam 2

 ekkaDaina hariyokkaDanucu madi cakkadanamu gani sokki santatamu
   
caraNam 3

 endubOka rAkEndu mukhuni tanayandu jUci phalamandu kOru shrI
   
caraNam 4

 dEhametti sandEha padaka vaidEhi bhAgyamA dEhi dEhi yani
   
caraNam 5

 sAdhu sajjanalu bOdha cEta bhavabAdha mAnavle sAdhakambutO
   
caraNam 6

 dInuDaina pandhAnuDaina vinumanu rAgamuna manOsangi shrI
   
caraNam 7

 rAga rahita jana bhAgadEyuni vinA gati evvarE tyAgarAjanuta
